Marquee Trivia

Boston's First Trivia Night For Film Lovers

took us long enough...

About Us

Marquee Trivia was started by Wesley Emblidge and James Macon (pictured in the very much not staged photo to the right) in 2019. We felt a severe lack of hardcore film trivia in the Boston area which is, as you know, the mark of a world class city. In response Marquee Trivia was created.

Marquee Trivia is held once a month in the greater Boston area. Each month brings a different theme for the night with questions that orbit around that theme and prizes that are for sure definitely 100% totally at best tangentially related to the theme for the night.

For more information and to stay up-to-date with each month's event sign up for our newsletter!

See you at trivia!

Wesley & James
